de.tub.pes.syscir.sc_model

Class SCModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tub.pes.syscir.sc_model.SCStruct
      • de.tub.pes.syscir.sc_model.SCModule

  • public class SCModule
extends SCStruct
    this represents a SystemC-Module, it contains variables, functions, a constructor, a list of fathers and a marker if its a channel or not, it inherits these parts from SCStruct it also contains a list of ports an sockets, a list of processes, a list of moduleInstances and a List of events
    Author:
    Florian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SCModule(java.lang.String Module_name)
      creates an empty Module without a father-module
      SCModule(java.lang.String Module_name, java.util.List<SCModule> inherit)
      creates an empty Module with an father-module
